desc: Our unique instant smoothie blends contain 100% natural fruit, vegetable, and other superfoods to give you essential vitamins, minerals, and energy. At under 200 calories a serving, get yourself a clean & green beverage snack

layout.text: Delicious Healthy Super-Smoothies In under 30 seconds

No Added Sugar. No Preservatives.
Only the goodness of fruit, vegetables, and other super-foods to give you the energy boost you need.
Don’t let your busy lifestyle get in the way of your health.
Frugease. Anytime and Anywhere.
